statements: SELECT * FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE abandonment_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates ORDER BY abandonment_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE total_amount < 100.00;
SELECT user_id, abandonment_time, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT product_id, total_amount, quantity, abandonment_time, user_id FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE total_amount > 50
SELECT user_id, product_id, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE quantity >= 3 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, abandonment_time, product_id FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE product_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003)
SELECT product_id, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment_rates WHERE abandonment_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates;
SELECT user_id, cart_id, abandon_timestamp FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates ORDER BY abandon_timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM ShoppingCartItems WHERE cart_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(cart_id) FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT cart_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ShoppingCartItems GROUP BY cart_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT user_id, cart_id, abandon_timestamp FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates ORDER BY abandon_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, cart_id, abandon_timestamp FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM ShoppingCartItems WHERE cart_id = 500 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(cart_id) AS num_carts FROM ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM ShoppingCartItems JOIN ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates USING (cart_id) WHERE user_id = 1002
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, phone_number DESC
SELECT DISTINCT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, product_id, abandoned_at FROM shopping_cart_abandonment WHERE user_id = 2 AND total_amount > 50
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart_abandonment LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM shopping_cart_abandonment WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, o.order_date FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM abandonment_rate WHERE abandonment_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY abandonment_time;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, product.product_name, order_history.quantity FROM customer INNER JOIN order_history ON customer.customer_id = order_history.customer_id INNER JOIN product ON order_history.product_id = product.product_id WHERE customer.email = 'test@example.com';

SELECT customer.first_name AS name, product.product_name AS item, abandonment_rate.abandonment_time AS abandoned_at FROM customer INNER JOIN abandonment_rate ON customer.customer_id = abandonment_rate.customer_id INNER JOIN product ON abandonment_rate.abandoned_product_id = product.product_id ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, COUNT(order_history.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customer LEFT JOIN order_history ON customer.customer_id = order_history.customer_id GROUP BY customer.first_name, customer.last_name HAVING total_orders > 3;
